headline: Grilled Halloumi
name: Grilled Halloumi
description: Grilled halloumi cooks up charred and crispy outside, soft and salty inside, plus the cheese keeps its shape on the grill. Perfect for summer BBQs!
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces halloumi cheese, sliced into 1/2-inch pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
Brush olive oil over both sides of each slice of halloumi cheese.
Place halloumi directly on the grate and grill for 3 minutes; flip and grill 3 minutes more. Serve immediately.
